long_description: With smooth flex, built-in cushioning that softens landings and fully-adjustable highbacks that dial-in stance, it's no wonder Burton Mission snowboard bindings are an all-mountain favorite. Re:Flex minimized, cored baseplates dramatically improve board flex and feel, reduce weight and allow a variety of cushioning options. Short-glass fiber/nylon baseplates feature gapless EVA toe and heel pads; adjustable toe ramps reduce toe drag and increase responsiveness. FullBED(TM) cushioning covers the entire baseplate, and shock-absorbent damping pads eat up vibrations, sudden impacts and rough terrain so you don't have to. Canted Living Hinge(TM) Zero-Lean highbacks offers a playful, relaxed fit and feel; highbacks can be cranked forward for a more aggressive stance. Superstrap(TM) ankle straps feature precurved spines molded to match the shape of your feet and ankles; gel padding dials in comfort. Gettagrip capstrap toe straps feature a slim, 3D design; rubber material grips boot toes for a secure, locked-down fit. Smooth Glide(TM) buckles deliver buttery-smooth and reliable ratcheting power season after season. Burton Mission bindings are compatible with traditional 3D(TM), 4x4 bolt patterns and The Channel.
